listitem.para: OSGiRestClient - A JavaScript client API for accessing and managing a remote OSGi framework through the REST API.
OSGiRestCallback - Callback object provided to the OSGiRestClient functions. Invoked on completion of the remote invocation.

section.title: JavaScript interface OSGiRestClient
section.para: Provides a JavaScript client API for accessing and managing a remote OSGi framework through the REST API. Implementations will provide a proprietary constructor to create objects of this signature. Once created the object can be used from JavaScript environments to manage the framework.

formalpara.title: cb
formalpara.para: The callbacks invoked on completion of the remote invocation. On success the success() callback is invoked with the Bundle List representation.

formalpara.title: cb
formalpara.para: The callbacks invoked on completion of the remote invocation. On success the success() callback is invoked with the Bundle Representations List representation.

formalpara.title: cb
formalpara.para: The callbacks invoked on completion of the remote invocation. On success the success() callback is invoked with the Framework Start Level representation.

section.title: void setFrameworkStartLevel(Object fwsl, OSGiRestCallback cb)

formalpara.title: fwsl
formalpara.para: Framework Start Level representation object with the desired state.

formalpara.title: cb
formalpara.para: The callbacks invoked on completion of the remote invocation. On success the success() callback is invoked with the resulting Framework Start Level representation.

section.para: Change the Framework Start Level and/or initial bundle start level.

section.title: JavaScript interface OSGiRestCallback
section.para: Objects implementing this signature are provided by users of the OSGiRestClient as callbacks. One of the callback functions is invoked on completion of a REST invocation.

section.title: void success(Object response)
section.para: Called when the invocation completes successfully.

section.title: void failure(short httpCode, Object response)
section.para: Called when the HTTP response code is not what was expected.

section.title: void error(Object response)
section.para: Called when an error occurred with the remote invocation.
